name: Glitch Pets
description:
WARNING: This game may potentially trigger seizures for people with EPILEPSY Viewer discretion is advised.

Multiple game modes: Surf, Fall and Dodge, Adventure, Flower Bounce: so far

Use your camera often in the Adventure mode to discover all the secrets
How fast can you beat each level? You have TRIPLE JUMP after all (: and can 'surf' on certain slanted objects to gain momentum and fly through the air;;
however, you could take it slow and enjoy the scenery

GLITCHES are probably FEATURES, but you can feel free to report whatever you think is a bug, annoying, or otherwise lame; and of course, suggestions are always welcome. Many have already been implemented!
